segments.text: I see a rather chaotic scene unfolding in this kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The two children are definitely up to no good with that cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really stretching, precariously balanced on that unstable stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It looks like it could go over backward at any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His little sister is right there, completely complicit in the plan.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Meanwhile, the sink is overflowing dramatically, making a huge mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is just cascading onto the floor and the cabinet doors below.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman, bless her heart, is oblivious, calmly drying a dish.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's standing right in the growing puddle, which is just incredible.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost hear the soft sloshing sound as the water spreads.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a truly messy situation this is turning into.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone really needs to turn that faucet off soon.
segments.speaker: PAR
